meanings.definition: A hormone secreted by the pituitary gland that stimulates the adrenal cortex to produce corticosteroids.
meanings.sent1: The adrenocorticotrophin helps the adrenal cortex make corticosteroids.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use adrenocorticotrophin to test adrenal function.
meanings.sent3: The adrenocorticotrophin whispered to the adrenal cortex, 'Time to make some corticosteroids!'
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like adrenocorticotrophin, sparking the adrenal cortex into action.
meanings.sent5: The adrenocorticotrophin was the conductor orchestrating the adrenal cortex's corticosteroid symphony.
